content.question: Which of the following factors that influence voters’ decision making during an election is the cartoonist poking fun at?

choices.label: The party identification and ideological orientation of the candidate
The education and age of the candidate
The candidate’s knowledge of contemporary political issues

topic.text: 5.4: How and Why Political Parties Change and Adapt

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the argument or perspective in the source relates to political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
